Welcome!

I am a research associate at the University of Colorado, Boulder, specializing in plant community ecology and restoration ecology. My goal is to produce "usable" science to improve ecosystem management. I use a combination of long-term data analysis, population modeling and field experiments to this end. My research spans a variety of systems, including working rangelands, serpentine grasslands, woodlands and alpine.
